TextView.android:text:
Samuel Henry John Worthington
is an Australian actor. He is best known for playing Jake Sully in the Avatar franchise, Marcus Wright in Terminator Salvation, and Perseus in Clash of the Titans and its sequel Wrath of the Titans. He has taken more dramatic roles, appearing in The Debt, Everest, Hacksaw Ridge, The Shack, Manhunt: Unabomber and Fractured
